law.catch_line: There is a Maryland Not-For-Profit Development Center Program Fund in the Department....

section.section: There is a Maryland Not-For-Profit Development Center Program Fund in the Department.
The Fund is a special, nonlapsing fund that is not subject to reversion under § 7-302 of the State Finance and Procurement Article.

The Fund consists of:
money appropriated in the State budget to the Fund; and
all other money accepted for the benefit of the Fund, including an additional $50 fee to be paid for the processing of articles of incorporation of a nonstock corporation in accordance with § 1-203 of the Corporations and Associations Article.

text.section: The purpose of the Fund is to provide grant money to support the operations of the Program consistent with this subtitle.
